newsitem.title: EU: EP REGIONAL COMMITTEE AGENDA - NOV 25-26.
newsitem.headline: EP REGIONAL COMMITTEE AGENDA - NOV 25-26.

text.p: Committee on Regional Policy [[ Monday 25 November 1996 ]] Room LEO 7 C 50 ===] Monday, 25 November 1996, from 3 p.m. 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE 219.982 ) 2. Approval of minutes of meeting of: - 23-24 September 1996 (PE 218.854 ) 3. Chairman's announcements possibly 3.1 In the presence of the Council and Commission 4. Report on development problems and structural assistance in Italy (T04674) PMC0115 94D0629 C4-0050/96 PMC0019 C(94)3410 C4-0051/96 PMC0156 C(94)3406 C4-0052/96 + REGI Fond R PODESTA G. (UPE) (PE218.846 ) - Consideration of amendments 5. Report on development problems and structural assistance in Germany (T04671) PMC0117 C(94)1717 C4-0047/96 PMC0152 C(94)3378 C4-0048/96 PMC0020 C(94)3377 C4-0049/96 PMC0107 LET 34349/95 + REGI Fond R BOTZ Gerhard. (PSE) (PE219.981 ) - Consideration of draft report 6. FIRST EP/LOCAL AND REGIONAL AUTHORITIES CONFERENCE IN BRUSSELS (FROM 1 TO 3 OCTOBER 1996) (DVR0383 ) - Exchange of views on the conclusions to be drawn 7. Report on development problems and structural assistance in France (T04662) PMC0097 C(94)1931 C4-0039/96 PMC0118 C(94)1935 C4-0043/96 PMC0120 C(94)1932 C4-0040/96 PMC0121 C(94)1933 C4-0041/96 PMC0148 C(94)3399 C4-0044/96 PMC0098 C(94)1930 C4-0038/96 PMC0159 C(94)3385 C4-0045/96 PMC0018 C(94)3398 C4-0046/96 PMC0092 LET 34026/95 PMC0096 C(94)1934 C4-0042/96 + REGI Fond R CASTAGNEDE Bernard. (ARE) + REGI Fond CASTAGNEDE Bernard. (ARE) - Presentation by the Commission - Exchange of views 8. The implementation of European Union regional policies in Austria, Finland a nd Sweden (T05028) COS0471 COM(96)0316 C4-0533/96 + REGI Fond R RACK Reinhard. (PPE) - Presentation by the Commission - Exchange of views 9. Delegation to Graz/Styria (Austria) from 25 to 28 June 1996 (VIS0129 ) - Consideration of the delegation's report 9.2 at 6 p.m. 9.3 Coordinators' meeting ===] Tuesday, 26 November 1996, at 9 a.m. 10. Report on development problems and structural assistance in Italy (T04674) PMC0115 94D0629 C4-0050/96 PMC0019 C(94)3410 C4-0051/96 PMC0156 C(94)3406 C4-0052/96 + REGI Fond R PODESTA G. (UPE) (PE218.846 ) - Adoption of draft report 11. Presentation by Mr Eneko LANDABURU, Director-General of DG XVI, of the cohe sion report, Article 130b - Exchange of views 12. 1995 discharge - general budget - Section III (T04845) (T04845) DEC0070 SEC(96)0421 C4-0280/96 + REGI Avis COSTA NEVES C. (ELD) F CONT Fond - Presentation by Mr Antoni CASTELLS, Member of the Court of Auditors, of the Co urt of Auditors' 1995 report, concerning - the parts covered by our committee's terms of reference - Exchange of views 13. Towards a new maritime strategy (T04818) COS0405 COM(96)0081 C4-0237/96 + REGI Avis A BERNARDINI Francois. (PE219.976 ) (PSE) F TRAN Fond R DANESIN Alessandro. (UPE) (PE219.920 ) - Consideration of draft opinion 14. Annual report of the Cohesion Fund, 1995 (T04994) COS0461 COM(96)0388 C4-0509/96 + REGI Fond R NOVO Honorio. (GUE) - Presentation by the Commission - Exchange of views 15. Appointment of rapporteurs and draftsmen - decisions on procedure 16. Any other business ===] Tuesday, 26 November 1996, at 3 p.m. - room LEO 3 C 50 17. P U B L I C H E A R I N G 17.1 held by the Committee on Regional Policy and the Committee on Culture, Yout h, Education and the Media 17.2 on culture and structural policy: a contribution to regional development an d employment 17.3 see programme in annex (PE 219.982/ANN ) 18. Date of next meeting (PE/IX/OJ/96-20 )
[FOOTNOTES]1. ) The hearing will take place in LEO - Room 3 C 50 - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
